text: Conrad Michael Richter (October 13, 1890 - October 30, 1968) was an American writer. He wrote The Light in the Forest. The book was made into a Walt Disney movie. One of his novels won the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction in 1951."Fiction". Past winners & finalists by category. The Pulitzer Prizes.
